item.description:
Spring is here. Let's get back in shape! We'll go for a brisk 45 minute walk followed by about 15 minutes of gentle yoga stretches. I'm a yoga teacher and can lead us through some easy stretches that will relieve tension in the legs, hips, and lower back.

Meet me in the parking area at the end of Coliseum ave. Bring water, a yoga mat or beach towel for stretching after the walk, and bug spray.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for red car with Meetup sign in the parking area or call Joan at 603-305-7114
item.name: Power Walk & Gentle Stretch
